shortdesc.ph: Sets whether to replace the current video feeds with images when publishing video streams.

p.codeblock: public abstract int enableVideoImageSource(boolean enabled, ImageTrackOptions options);
virtual int enableVideoImageSource(bool enable, const ImageTrackOptions& options) = 0;
public abstract int EnableVideoImageSource(bool enable, ImageTrackOptions options);
Future<void> enableVideoImageSource( {required bool enable, required ImageTrackOptions options});

section.note: Agora recommends that you call this method after joining a channel.
section.p: When publishing video streams, you can call this method to replace the current video feeds with custom images.
Once you enable this function, you can select images to replace the video feeds through the parameter. If you disable this function, the remote users see the video feeds that you publish.

plentry.pd:
Whether to replace the current video feeds with custom images:
: Replace the current video feeds with custom images.
: (Default) Do not replace the current video feeds with custom images.
